text: I'm really proud of myself because I've pared my beauty regimen down to a cream blush and berry-tinted lip balm, which has saved me so much time.
author: Katherine Heigl

text: Wealth, beauty, and fame are transient. When those are gone, little is left except the need to be useful.
author: Gene Tierney

text: Italian men do appreciate beautiful women. They're not afraid of the beauty, which is nice.
author: Eva Herzigova

text: I want, of course, peace, grace, and beauty. How do you do that? You work for it.
author: Studs Terkel

text: Bracketing has turned all my experiences, remembered and present, into a gallery of miracles where I wander around dazzled by the beauty of events I cannot explain.
author: Martha Beck
